entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CSC : error CS8103: Combined length of user strings used by the program exceeds allowed limit. in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Emit.UnitTests.csproj #71645
  • the analyzer shouldn't report issues about global suppression target format when `Scope = "namespaceanddescendants"` #71644
  • `EventHookupCommandHandler` stuck and hangs VS #71643
  • VerifyHashRDirective is failing consistently in CI. #71641
  • "Extract interface" generates invalid code for read-write properties #71640
    Backlog
  • Column "Make abstract" in "Extract Base Class" dialog is truncated or unusable in other languages #71639
    Backlog
  • Verbatim identifier prefix is displayed inconsistently in tooltips for anonymous types #71638
    Backlog
  • Delegates are not properly reformatted when converting property from expression body to block body #71637
    Backlog
  • Block syntax in expression-bodied method is not reformatted when refactoring implicitly converts it to block-bodied method #71636
    Backlog

Closed

  • Update code fix for SYSLIB1054 to use a collection expression #71647

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Make list a collection builder type #71646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Verify SyntaxList length in SyntaxNodeCache.TryGetNode() #71642
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #71635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #71634
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Harden some codepaths from producing null #71595
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update code to use collection expressions #71591
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to value-tasks in asset lookup #71360
    Area-IDE, untriaged
